event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU), the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: Fan rotation speed either dropped below a threshold or rose above a threshold during fan speed change testing.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
Fan rotation speed either dropped below a threshold or rose above a threshold during fan speed change testing.

Test of fan speed control for the FRU happens during platform poweron
and when a PSU fan or fan tray is inserted into a running system.

Nothing is deconfigured and no action is taken.



The recommended service action for this event is to schedule the replacement of the affected FRU.

       LEGEND

      RED        = SUNW-MSG-ID
      BLUE     = EVENT_ID
      GREEN  = FRU


Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):


   Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:

   Mar 20 21:37:52 san-ff2-21-0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12, CSN: 7860000772  
   EVENT-ID: e985637d-2961-4908-8574-c1d3a49e9664
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8006-02 for detailed information.


   Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:

   MSG-ID: SCF-8006-02, TYPE: Fault, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Minor
   EVENT-TIME: Tue Mar 20 21:37:52 UTC 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: 7860000772, HOSTNAME: san-ff2-21-0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID: e985637d-2961-4908-8574-c1d3a49e9664
   DESC: Fan rotation speed either dropped below a threshold or rose above a threshold during fan speed change
   testing.
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8006-02 for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: Nothing is deconfigured.
   IMPACT: No action is taken.
   REC-ACTION: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU),
   the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID.
   Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.


Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command

   
   SPARC Enterprise platform example:
 
   xscf> fmdump -v -u e985637d-2961-4908-8574-c1d3a49e9664

   TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
   Mar 20 21:37:52.8341 e985637d-2961-4908-8574-c1d3a49e9664 SCF-8006-02
     100%  fault.chassis.device.fan.speedchange

           Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/fan_a=0
              Affects: hc:///chassis=0/fan_a=0
                  FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=7860000772:
                       server-id=san-ff2-21-0/component=/FAN_A#0


Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.



If you require additional information, please refer to InfoDoc #87402.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
response
title
event_registry_properties.item: Fan rotation speed below or above a threshold detected during speed change testing.
